channel.title: Static Function Namespaces on ScrapComputers
channel.description: Recent content in Static Function Namespaces on ScrapComputers

item.title: sc
item.description: Description All data inside the sc namespace! Variables layoutFiles This table contains all layout files from $CONTENT_3660881a-a6b8-40e5-a348-27b368a742e9/Gui/Layout. You could also just write the names independently.

item.title: sc.audio
item.description: Description The Audio Module for the computer API! Structures AudioParameter Results for getParams Fields: default [ number ] The default value maximum [ number ] The maximum value minimum [ number ] The minimum value ParamsIncorrectTable Result for areParamsCorrect.

item.title: sc.base64
item.description: Description The Base64 Module for the computer API! Functions encode sc.base64.encode( data ) Converts a string to be Base64 encoded

item.title: sc.color
item.description: Description The Color Module for the computer API! Functions newSingluar sc.color.newSingluar( rgbNum ) Creates a new color from 1 value. Whatever rgbNum’s value has will be set on R, G, and B.

item.title: sc.fontmanager
item.description: Description The font manager allows you to, of course, manage fonts. You can get font information, get all font names you can use, etc.

item.title: sc.json
item.description: Description The JSON Module for the computer API! Functions isSafe sc.json.isSafe( root ) Returns true if a tlua table is safe to convert to JSON.

item.title: sc.math
item.description: Description A helper module for your needs that are math-related Functions clamp sc.math.clamp(value, min, max) Clamps a number value to be ranged from the min argument to the max argument.

item.title: sc.md5
item.description: Description An encryption module for MD5 only! (Even tho it’s no longer recommended to use this for encryption! ) Functions new sc.

item.title: sc.sha256
sc.table
item.description: Description The Table Module for the computer API! Functions clone sc.table.clone( tbl ) Clones a table This function doesn't really need to exist This function is utterly unnecessary but in SOME situations is useful.
